#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zY[i] <- 0
		zY[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fY[i] <- (alphaY / sY) * pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY - 1) * exp(-pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY))
		phi[i] <- -log(fY[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris PM10
	alphaY ~  dunif(0,10)
	sY ~ dunif(0,250)
}

data
list(y=c(407, 759, 782, 554, 461, 523, 151, 288, 155, 187, 216, 242, 404, 458, 492, 863, 689, 577, 593, 212, 170, 235, 283, 616, 447, 912, 697, 315, 366, 252, 469, 249, 208, 498, 174, 219, 323, 342, 336, 399, 726, 375, 489, 288, 165, 180, 280, 317, 303, 512, 686, 474, 355, 254, 86, 118, 142, 161, 205, 201, 243, 419, 297, 623, 164, 197, 417, 266, 356, 268, 395, 287, 297, 710, 758, 721, 367, 312, 220, 193, 203, 372, 197, 447, 432, 535, 323, 312, 339, 198, 100, 96, 102, 135, 171, 231, 351, 268, 828, 344, 510, 219, 200, 235, 300, 252, 230, 346, 218, 291, 733, 225, 265, 191, 182, 190, 122, 261, 216, 248, 238, 329, 357, 415, 374, 257, 253, 129, 193, 152, 165, 191, 504, 276, 613, 664, 147, 152, 120, 189, 101, 165, 151, 168, 230, 202, 346, 157, 146, 212, 98, 177, 188, 325, 186, 195, 216, 299, 314, 342, 239, 267, 136, 174, 124, 146, 215, 376, 572, 336, 378, 405, 331, 216, 183, 164, 120, 171, 176, 305, 283, 211, 433, 241, 264, 304, 145, 126, 174, 230, 326, 272, 317, 240, 456, 451, 348, 357, 145, 139, 198, 198, 252, 462, 322, 183, 256, 193, 253, 322, 107, 122, 165, 285, 163, 400, 386, 303, 498, 311, 463, 237, 198, 172, 171, 275, 276, 328, 310, 314, 387, 255, 186, 205, 204, 292, 259, 281, 305, 321, 319, 427, 286, 262, 205, 223, 175, 191, 156, 283, 299, 309, 291, 262, 302, 279, 368, 192, 281, 220, 180, 283, 205, 335, 352, 296, 251, 290, 299, 186, 192, 171, 246, 243, 239, 410, 332, 373, 311, 198, 262, 276, 194, 124, 200, 175, 215, 268, 240, 260, 245, 282, 411, 180, 157, 150, 164, 169, 176, 264, 245, 194, 598, 452, 387, 288, 235, 128, 140, 214, 268, 211, 661, 229, 809, 505, 448, 173, 166, 152, 151, 240, 162, 460), N=324)
